item.title: Red Hat Advanced Solution Provider
item.description: I am proud to announce that Origoss Solutions is now a Red Hat Advanced Solution Provider with a Cloud Infrastructure / PaaS specialization. Red Hat OpenShift is a comprehensive enterprise-grade application platform, built for containers with Kubernetes. As a Red Hat Advanced Solution Provider and as a Kubernetes Certified Service Provider, we help our customers in their successful Cloud Native transformation, leveraging our several decades of experience in consulting, developing, supporting legacy network and IT system operation.
